commit message:
Rotation should not cancel the search

Since we use the same layout for both horizontal and vertical, this is easy:
just have the system tell us when the configuration changes rather than
restarting the application.

Fix a possible NPE in ModuleHelper

We should not assume that a module has an author and distribution object already
in place.

Adding the new logo Laura made for me

This is the dropshadow free version since the dropshadow version is clipped
incorrectly. I will update it to the dropshadow version once she gets that
fixed.
Based on the feedback I'm getting, I feel ready for release
releng: bump the version number again
